name: CAPTURE CORPS: ARCHIPELAGO
description:
CAPTURE CORPS : ARCHIPELAGO is an entry to the 10 days DreadXP Dredge the Depths Jam.

Welcome onboard !

Here, at Capture Corps Incorporated we are specialized in discovering the secrets of the most remote ocean places on earth. 

We provide to our employees the latest technological gear, bundled with experimental features. 

For todays mission you will be equiped with :

- A mobile phone equiped with a next generation photographic lens, storing up to 60 photos !

- A solid boat that will carry you without any issues on any type of ocean.

- A team of technical and logistical support ready to help you at any time if needed !

Now grab your waterproof coat and join us, we need you to collect some precious data on some remote archipelago.

Starting day on December 6th of 2004, be ready.

Takes around 5-10 minutes to compete, playing with headphones is recomended to better enjoy the audiowork. 

Additionnal Instruction (All of these are also displayed inGame) :

Controls  On Boat :  

- W + Mouse to Move

- SHIFT to Speed Up

Controls On Foot : 

- Middle Mouse Click to Open/Close the Phone

- WASD to Move, Mouse to Look 

Controls On PhotoMode :

- SPACE to Take Picture

- SCROLL to Zoom

- TAB to Access PhotoCollection
